fields.name: Jack of all trades (passive):
fields.value:
Every night phase you receive up to X actions of any other role that's still alive in the game, the people with the original roles don't loose their action, **Jack** is just able to use it. You are able to get actions you can use in the day also in the mix, however you cannot use them until the day phase. Every Action is a 1 time use, once the action is used, you cannot use any other actions that night, and they all disappear
X = 0 if last place
X = 1 if 15%+
X = 2 if 30%+
X = 3 if 45%+
X = 4 if 60%+
X = 5 if 75%+ or win

fields.name: Win Condition:
fields.value: Survive the game or win if mafia aligned
